title: How to Make a Cool 10 Minute Nerf Fort

steps.headline: Get 4 tall objects.
steps.description: Arrange them in a large square shape, but don't make it too tall. You can also get more tall objects. Then you would get more blankets

steps.headline: Place a blanket over the top.
steps.description: Lay 4 heavy objects on the towers. You can use also use clips to hold it in place.

steps.headline: Cover the front, back, and 1 side of the fort with cardboard taped to the floor and blanket.
steps.description: Create small windows and sniper slots in the cardboard.

steps.headline: Get a tower the height of a cardboard box.
steps.description: Place it in the front of the uncovered side and mount a Vulcan. (You can also use any gun that has a bi-pod, and is heavy with large ammo capacity.)

steps.headline: Get a case.
steps.description: Fill it with ammo and put it in the fort. Add food and drinks if needed. Have pillows or other things inside. Keep a weapons stockpile.

steps.headline: Cover the uncovered side, leaving space to retrieve the Vulcan.
steps.description: Man the sniper slots for defense.

text: Get 4 tall objects. Arrange them in a large square shape, but don't make it too tall. You can also get more tall objects. Then you would get more blankets Place a blanket over the top. Lay 4 heavy objects on the towers. You can use also use clips to hold it in place. Cover the front, back, and 1 side of the fort with cardboard taped to the floor and blanket. Create small windows and sniper slots in the cardboard. Get a tower the height of a cardboard box. Place it in the front of the uncovered side and mount a Vulcan. (You can also use any gun that has a bi-pod, and is heavy with large ammo capacity.) Get a case. Fill it with ammo and put it in the fort. Add food and drinks if needed. Have pillows or other things inside. Keep a weapons stockpile. Cover the uncovered side, leaving space to retrieve the Vulcan. Man the sniper slots for defense.
